SVDCNN and Char - CNN.from sentence: For SVDCNN and Char - CNN , we calculated the abovementioned number from the network architecture implemented in PyTorch .

SVDCNN experimental settings.from sentence: The SVDCNN experimental settings are similar to the original VDCNN paper , using the same dictionary and the same embedding size of 16 .

performed with.from sentence: The training is also performed with SGD , utilizing size batch of 64 , with a maximum of 100 epochs .

use.from sentence: We use an initial learning rate of 0.01 , a momentum of 0.9 and a weight decay of 0.001 .

performed on: NVIDIA GTX 1060 GPU + Intel Core i 7 4770s CPU

performed on.from sentence: All the experiments were performed on an NVIDIA GTX 1060 GPU + Intel Core i 7 4770s CPU .
